name: @flareapp/ignition-ui
description: UI components for Laravel's Ignition error page

scripts.bundle: microbundle -i src/index.ts -o dist/index.js --tsconfig tsconfig.json --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment -f modern --no-sourcemap --external react,react-dom --define process.env.NODE_ENV='production'
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -n "dev,typescript" -c ",green" "microbundle watch -i src/index.ts -o dist/index.js --tsconfig tsconfig.dev.json --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment -f modern --no-sourcemap --external react,react-dom --define process.env.NODE_ENV='development' --no-compress --raw" "yarn typecheck"

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && yarn bundle && git add dist/index.modern.js
